page.title: 18YALDING CHURCHES & GHOSTS
page.content: Both Nettlestead and Yalding parish churches belong to the Church of England. The priest in charge of St Mary, Nettlestead, is the Reverend Peter Haynes of East Peckham, who is also priest in charge of East Peckham. The vicar of St Peter and St Paul, Yalding, is the Reverend Peter Wilkinson who lives in Yalding and has also care of Laddingford and Collier Street parishes. Other religious denominations are not represented, Yalding Baptist Church being now converted to a Youth Centre. As far as can be ascertained there are, perhaps surprisingly, no houses in the area which are reputed to be haunted. However, the extension of Windmill Path from Mount Avenue, Yalding, to Lughorse Lane is said to be haunted. A murder is said to have occurred there.
